original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava … avigate nava.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava  / avigate nava  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na aupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: With object-impression-visible-non-causative-non-resultant-non-result-idea … (in brief) … With cause nine … With object nine … With ignorance nine.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe  na sanidassana sappaṭigham anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa
translated: With object-impression-visible-non-causative-non-resultant-non-result-not-subject-to-clinging-idea … (in brief) … With cause nine … With object nine … With ignorance nine.🔽With object-impression-visible-non-causative-non-resultant-non-result-subject-to-clinging-idea … (in brief) … With cause nine … With object nine … With ignorance nine.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: With object-impression-visible-non-causative-non-resultant-non-result-not-subject-to-clinging-not-subject-to-defilement-idea … (in brief) … With cause thirty … With object nine … With ignorance thirty.🔽With object-impression-visible-non-causative-non-resultant-non-result-not-subject-to-defilement-idea … (in brief) … With cause thirty … With object nine … With ignorance thirty.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa
translated: … a non-perceptible, non-impacting, unadulterated, unadulterated-by-defilement … (Abbreviated.) … as cause, thirty; as object, nine; … as non-hindrance, thirty.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ🔽nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigha  na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na upekkhā sahagata
translated: … a non-perceptible, non-impacting, not-accompanied-by-happiness …🔽… a non-perceptible, non-impacting, not-accompanied-by-pleasure …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate tisa
translated: … a non-perceptible, non-impacting, not-accompanied-by-equanimity … (Abbreviated.) … as cause, thirty; as object, nine; … as non-hindrance, thirty.
